subject: Re: Difference between new 12-470 and old one?
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Hi Laura.  The new version of the 12-470 is solid black.  The old one is grey and white.  

Margaret

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "lunalamia" <rainspirit1@...> wrote:
>
> How do you tell if the RS 12-470 is the new or the old version?
> ~ Laura
>
